titles.title: Cargo Preference Reporting Act
Cargo Preference Reporting Act
A bill to require the Administrator of the Maritime Administration to publicly report cargo preference data on an annual basis.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Cargo Preference Reporting Act
This bill requires the U.S. Maritime Administration to make public and submit to Congress a report regarding cargo preference data on an annual basis.
